summary: A small edit to controls.txt that remaps the D pad when using a controller.

[line]

[center][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61707-3-1421293680.png[/img][/center]
When I was playing Skyrim on PS3, I always felt that the measly two hotkeys the game gave you on a controller was insultingly useless. Now that I'm on PC, [i]and[/i] now that I finally figured out how to use x360ce, I decided to do something about it. Namely, remove the hotkeys and bind those keys to something much more useful:

[list][*]Left on the D-Pad will now bring up the Magic menu (Just like pressing "P" with Keyboard controls.)[/*]
[*]Right on the D-Pad will now bring up the Inventory menu (Just like pressing "I" with Keyboard controls.)
[/*]
[*]Up on the D-Pad will now Start or Stop Auto-running.[/*]
[*]Down on the D-Pad will still bring up the Favorites menu. I use it for potions and poisons. :)[/*]
[/list]
Anyhow, I figured other people might feel the same way, so I decided to upload this. Enjoy.
